Html:
Hello,

I am using MVVM Light for my projects in WPF.

I would like to develop mobile applications using MVVM Light (Android, iOs, and Windows Phone).

I hesitate between MVVM Light and mvvm cross because MVVM Light does not offer a plugin to access contact, picture etc.

Is what it will be possible to develop plugin for mvvm light is to share with the community.

Best Regards
Mohamed CHOUCHANE
